description.html:
This month we welcome the fantastic Paula Kennedy to speak at Tech Nottingham.

Plus we'll be having fun, playing some games and giving away swag and prizes.

This event will be on Zoom and the link will be available on the night.

***Leadership & Lego***
by Paula Kennedy

Are you feeling overwhelmed with your workload and finding there are just not enough hours in the day? Are you keen to get promoted or take on additional responsibility, but unsure how you could manage it all? Through the medium of lego, Paula will tell the story of how she handled a promotion in a previous role which doubled the number of teams she was responsible for. She will share the advice that she received from a leadership coach and how she applied it, describing what worked for her as well as what didn't. This talk will provide tips for how to keep your workload at a sustainable level, as well as advice on taking on a leadership role.

**About Paula**

Paula is currently taking a break to home-school her children through lockdown, but most recently was Senior Director, Global Education at VMware Tanzu. Her previous roles include Senior Director of Platform Services & Education EMEA at Pivotal and Chief Operating Officer & co-founder of CloudCredo. Paula has worked in the IT industry for over 20 years and is passionate about community, diversity, equity and inclusion. She is part of the organising committee for DevOpsDays London and also organises the London Platform User Group and Coed:Code meetup groups. You will mostly find her doom-scrolling on Twitter or else struggling with Year 5 level maths!

**Win Stuff at Tech Nottingham!**

We’ll be giving away some awesome prizes to our lucky attendees. Details on how to win will be shared during the event.

**Join in with the Nottingham Tech Community online**

The Tech Nottingham Slack group is a bustling chat community of Nottingham tech folk sharing ideas, jokes, stories and helping one another. We'd love for you to join in and be a part of it!

Join our Slack group: http://www.technottingham.com/slack

**Thanks to our sponsors**
Capital One, Cronofy, MHR

Full event details here: https://www.technottingham.com/events/tech-nottingham-march-2021
